document.full_text: germany's parliament says its human rights committee is protesting the conditions in which a united states army private suspected of giving classified material to wikileaks is being detained.
document.title: europe: germany: an appeal to obama over a u.s. prisoner's treatment
lines_and_colors: germany's parliament says its human rights committee is protesting the conditions in which a united states army private suspected of giving classified material to wikileaks is being detained.
